    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Change internal type from translated_text to translated_field</description>
        <name>Modify sys_search_source column</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[modifyFieldType();

function modifyFieldType() {
    if (pm.isZboot())
        return;

    var glideRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_dictionary");
    glideRecord.addEncodedQuery("name=sys_search_source^internal_type=translated_text");
    glideRecord.query();
    if (glideRecord.next()) {
        glideRecord.setValue('internal_type', 'translated_field');
        glideRecord.update();
        gs.log('internal type modified');
    }
}]]></script>
